hero.info1: I can bring your frontend architecture to the next level.
hero.info2: I have a strong passion for programming and enjoy to work with brilliant engineers.

about.hello: Hi, I'm Christian Fischer. Nice to meet you.
about.info1: I work as a software engineer for 6+ years now. In the past I acquired a good overview about the industry landscape and worked with many different technologies and programming languages. I specialised myself in frontend topics like JavaScript, React, Angular, HTML, CSS, TypeScript. This is what I enjoy the most and I strive to grow my expertise in team structures, leadership and anything software related.
